newsitem.title: USA: NAI Technologies gets $3 mln in orders.
newsitem.headline: NAI Technologies gets $3 mln in orders.

text.p: NAI Technologies Inc on Wenesday said its Systems division has been awarded $3 million in initial orders by the U.S. Government, for the design, integration and production of computer-based information processing systems.

The so-called "VME" systems consists of a complex configuration, with over two dozen digital signal processor modules running concurrently, housed in a compact and lightweight rack-mountable chassis, NAI said.
The future potential for additional systems is estimated in excess of $40 million, the company said.
NAI Technologies is a diversified international electronics company involved in both advanced computer system design and telecommunications.
